title: Client Repairing on Loading game screen
body:
Hey,
Last days i have a problem with client.Almost every time im going from champ select to Loading Screen,it throws me out and its repairing client.It does it for about 4 minutes,and most times my team is voting for remake before i come back.
Here you can find some ss that show the problem,i really need a solution cuz season is ending and i cant play ranked games cause of it.
[](https://prnt.sc/g7se2n)
[](https://prnt.sc/g7zqey)

I tryed to fix it with the new tool,but when i choose the reinstall patch option,it shows me this,and tool is closing  [](https://prnt.sc/g7zrtj)

replies.body:
If trying to run a force repatch using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) hasn't seemed to work for you so far, there might be a couple of different things going on here. Either the client still has some stray files that don't seem to be getting updated properly, or there might actually be something giving your connection a hard time getting through to our servers. 

If possible, go ahead and try running a quick repair through the client options, but also make sure to run through your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying close attention to port forwarding and how to flush your DNS. That should make sure that you can get a solid link with us, but don't hesitate to hit me back up if this doesn't help!
I did all these things,in the start it was pretty good.Then it did the same error in the middle of a game,and then every game in the start had this error....

Well dang =\ . Let's go ahead and get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to send over those logs that the Hextech Repair Tool created, and they should be able to figure out what's going on from those logs.
